update study_active
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
picture = #{picture},
regbegintime= #{regbegintime},
regendtime= #{regendtime},
conbegintime= #{conbegintime},
conendtime= #{conendtime},
description= #{description},
contemplate= #{contemplate},
model= #{model}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,name,type,CONCAT(#{_ip},picture) picture, (CASE WHEN sysDate() < regbegintime and sysDate() < conbegintime THEN '未开始' WHEN regbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= regendtime and sysDate() < conbegintime THEN '报名中,评审未开始' WHEN regbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= regendtime and conbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= conendtime THEN '报名中,评审中' WHEN sysDate() > regendtime and sysDate() < conbegintime THEN '报名已结束,评审未开始' WHEN sysDate() > regendtime and conbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= conendtime THEN '报名已结束,评审中' WHEN sysDate() > regendtime and sysDate() > conendtime THEN '已结束' ELSE '' END) status, concat(DATE_FORMAT(regbegintime,'%Y-%c-%e'),' 至 ',DATE_FORMAT(regendtime,'%Y-%c-%e')) regdate, concat(DATE_FORMAT(conbegintime,'%Y-%c-%e'),' 至 ',DATE_FORMAT(conendtime,'%Y-%c-%e')) condate, description,contemplate,model,createdate from study_active where id = #{id}
SELECT d.id,d.name FROM zonekey_dept d WHERE d.id IN (SELECT u.deptid FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN study_works w ON u.loginname = w.userid WHERE w.activeid = #{activeid})

select count(*) from (select distinct(w.userid) from study_works w left join sys_user u on w.userid = u.loginname left join zonekey_dept d on u.deptid = d.id where w.activeid = #{acId} and d.id = #{deptid}) q

select count(*) from study_review_detail rd left join study_works w on rd.worksid = w.id where w.activeid = #{aid}
and rd.isover = #{isover}

select count(*) from study_active where 1=1
and type=#{value}

select id,name,type,CONCAT(#{_ip},picture) picture,DATE_FORMAT(regbegintime,'%Y-%m-%d') regbegintime, DATE_FORMAT(regendtime,'%Y-%m-%d') regendtime, DATE_FORMAT(conbegintime,'%Y-%m-%d') conbegintime, DATE_FORMAT(conendtime,'%Y-%m-%d') conendtime, description,contemplate,model,createdate from study_active where id = #{editid}

select a.id,a.name,a.type, (CASE WHEN sysDate() < a.regbegintime and sysDate() < a.conbegintime THEN '未开始' WHEN a.regbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= a.regendtime and sysDate() < a.conbegintime THEN '报名中,评审未开始' WHEN a.regbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= a.regendtime and a.conbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= a.conendtime THEN '报名中,评审中' WHEN sysDate() > a.regendtime and sysDate() < a.conbegintime THEN '报名已结束,评审未开始' WHEN sysDate() > a.regendtime and a.conbegintime <= sysDate() and sysDate() <= a.conendtime THEN '报名已结束,评审中' WHEN sysDate() > a.regendtime and sysDate() > a.conendtime THEN '已结束' ELSE '' END) status, a.contemplate from study_works w left join study_active a on w.activeid = a.id where w.id = #{workid}
select a.name,a.id value from zonekey_dept a where a.deleteflag=0 and a.attribute='3' and a.parentid='1'
select a.name,a.id value from zonekey_dept a where a.deleteflag=0 and a.attribute='3' and a.parentid='1'

select a.name,a.loginname value from sys_user a,zonekey_curriculum b where a.user_type=1 and a.deleteflag=0 AND b.userid=a.id AND b.live='1' and b.deleteflag='0' and FIND_IN_SET(a.deptid,getdeptChildLst(#{deptid})) AND concat(b.date ,' ',b.endtime)>sysdate() GROUP BY a.loginname

select a.name,a.loginname value from sys_user a,zonekey_resource b where a.user_type=1 and a.deleteflag=0 AND b.userid=a.id AND b.publishstate=1 and b.deleteflag='0' and FIND_IN_SET(a.deptid,getdeptChildLst(#{deptid})) GROUP BY a.loginname
